Section.name: S_20091
Section.title: PATHOLOGIC STAGE CLASSIFICATION (pTNM, AJCC 8th Edition) (Note G)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_59236
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_59236_1
Property.val: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

ListItem.name: LI_327892
ListItem.title: pT not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_20098
ListItem.title: pT0: No evidence of primary tumor

ListItem.name: LI_37078
ListItem.title: pTis: Carcinoma in situ / high-grade dysplasia

ListItem.name: LI_37116
ListItem.title: pT1: Tumor confined to the bile duct, with extension up to the muscle layer or fibrous tissue

DisplayedItem.name: DI_52064
DisplayedItem.title: pT2: Tumor invades beyond the wall of the bile duct to surrounding adipose tissue, or tumor invades adjacent hepatic parenchyma

ListItem.name: LI_37819
ListItem.title: pT2a: Tumor invades beyond the wall of the bile duct to surrounding adipose tissue

ListItem.name: LI_37145
ListItem.title: pT2b: Tumor invades adjacent hepatic parenchyma

ListItem.name: LI_37146
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumor invades unilateral branches of the portal vein or hepatic artery

ListItem.name: LI_37817
ListItem.title: pT4: Tumor invades the main portal vein or its branches bilaterally, or the common hepatic artery; or unilateral second-order biliary radicals with contralateral portal vein or hepatic artery involvement

ListItem.name: LI_327893
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327894
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_20106
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_37147
ListItem.title: pN1: One to three positive lymph nodes typically involving the hilar, cystic duct, common bile duct, hepatic artery, posterior pancreatoduodenal, and portal vein lymph nodes

ListItem.name: LI_37279
ListItem.title: pN2: Four or more positive lymph nodes from the sites described for N1

ListItem.name: LI_37818
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)
